Package datastorage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConnection
    This class is used to open and close a connection with a database.
    EmployeeDAO
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with employee's.
    IngredientDAO
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the ingredients.
    OrderDAO
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the orders.
    OrderRowDAO
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the products from an order.
    ProductDAO
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the products.
    ProductIngredientsDAO
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the ingredients of a product.
